meta.description: Minimize the total time needed to transport ducks to shore using boats and canoes.

sets.name: TRANSPORT_METHODS
sets.description: Different methods of transportation available for ducks.

params.name: ducks_per_trip
params.description: Number of ducks each transportation method can take per trip.

params.name: time_per_trip
params.description: Time in minutes each transportation method takes per trip.

vars.name: trips
vars.description: Number of trips made by each transportation method.

objective.name: min_total_time
objective.expr: sum(trips[m] * time_per_trip[m] for m in TRANSPORT_METHODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total time needed for all trips.

constraints.name: max_boat_trips
constraints.description: There can be at most 12 boat trips.

constraints.name: min_canoe_trip_percentage
constraints.description: At least 60% of the trips should be by canoe.

constraints.name: min_ducks_to_shore
constraints.description: At least 300 ducks need to be taken to shore.
